ingredient-information.sestavine: Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Glycerin, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Decyl Glucoside, Parfum, Sodium Chloride, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Polyquaternium-10, Sodium PCA, PEG-120 Methyl Glucose Dioleate, Citric Acid, Disodium EDTA, Coco-Glucoside, PPG-20, Methyl Glucose Ether, Propylene Glycol, Hydroxycetyl Hydroxyethyl Dimonium Chloride, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone, Alpha-Isomethyl lonone, Benzyl Salicylate, Citronellol, Coumarin, Geraniol, Limonene, Linalool.

product-info.opis: Kopel Moisturizing neguje vašo kožo, zahvaljujoč kremni formuli bogati z vlažilnimi snovmi. Uživajte v edinstvenem vonju Borotalca!

instruction-for-use.navodila-za-uporabo: Proizvod se doda vodi za kopel.
